001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain;
002
003import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
004import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Card.Rank;
006import java.util.Date;
007import java.util.LinkedList;
008import java.util.List;
009
010/**
011 * The Game class encapsulates the essential attributes of a game of UNO. This class provides
012 * methods to retrieve game details.
013 */
014public final class Game {
015
016  @Expose(serialize = false)
017  @SerializedName(value = "key", alternate = "id")
018  private final String id;
019
020  @Expose(serialize = false)
021  private final Date startTime;
022
023  @Expose(serialize = false)
024  private final Date endTime;
025
026  @Expose(serialize = false)
027  private final Date lastUpdatedOn;
028
029  @Expose(serialize = false)
030  private final boolean gameCompleted;
031
032  @Expose(serialize = false)
033  private final boolean rotationOrder;
034
035  @Expose(serialize = false)
036  private final User winner;
037
038  @Expose(serialize = false)
039  private final Card topDiscard;
040
041  @Expose
042  private final int minPlayer;
043
044  @Expose
045  private final int maxPlayer;
046
047  @Expose(serialize = false)
048  private final int playerCount;
049
050  @Expose(serialize = false)
051  private final GameState gameState;
052
053  @Expose(serialize = false)
054  private final List<Hand> hands;
055
056  /**
057   * Constructs an UNO game using the specified min and max number of players.
058   *
059   * @param minPlayer number of minimum players to start the game.
060   * @param maxPlayer maximum number of players who can join the game.
061   */
062  public Game(int minPlayer, int maxPlayer) {
063    this.minPlayer = minPlayer;
064    this.maxPlayer = maxPlayer;
065    id = null;
066    startTime = null;
067    endTime = null;
068    lastUpdatedOn = null;
069    gameCompleted = false;
070    rotationOrder = false;
071    winner = null;
072    topDiscard = null;
073    playerCount = 0;
074    gameState = GameState.CREATED;
075    hands = new LinkedList<>();
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Returns a String representing the external key associated with the UNO game.
080   *
081   * @return a String used to identify a specific UNO game.
082   */
083  public String getId() {
084    return id;
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Returns a Date object representing the time at which the UNO game was created.
089   *
090   * @return Date representing the time at which the UNO game was created.
091   */
092  public Date getStartTime() {
093    return startTime;
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Returns a Date object representing the time at which the UNO game concluded.
098   *
099   * @return Date representing the time at which the UNO game concluded.
100   */
101  public Date getEndTime() {
102    return endTime;
103  }
104
105  public Date getLastUpdatedOn() {
106    return lastUpdatedOn;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Returns whether the game has concluded based.
111   *
112   * @return boolean indicating if the game has concluded.
113   */
114  public boolean isGameCompleted() {
115    return gameCompleted;
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Returns a boolean flag indicating the player turn order direction.
120   *
121   * @return boolean indicating the play turn order in the UNO game.
122   */
123  public boolean isRotationOrder() {
124    return rotationOrder;
125  }
126
127  /**
128   * Returns the User who won the game of UNO.
129   *
130   * @return User who won the game.
131   */
132  public User getWinner() {
133    return winner;
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Returns the Card at the top of the UNO game discard pile.
138   *
139   * @return Card from the top of the game discard pile.
140   */
141  public Card getTopDiscard() {
142    return topDiscard;
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Returns the minimum number of players needed to start the UNO game.
147   *
148   * @return int representing the minimum number of players needed to start the UNO game.
149   */
150  public int getMinPlayer() {
151    return minPlayer;
152  }
153
154  /**
155   * Returns the max number of players that can join the UNO game.
156   *
157   * @return int representing the max number of players which can join the UNO game,
158   */
159  public int getMaxPlayer() {
160    return maxPlayer;
161  }
162
163  /**
164   * Returns the count/number of players in the game.
165   *
166   * @return int representing the number of players in the game.
167   */
168  public int getPlayerCount() {
169    return playerCount;
170  }
171
172  /**
173   * Returns the GameState which the UNO game is currently in.
174   *
175   * @return GameState at which the game is currently at.
176   */
177  public GameState getGameState() {
178    return gameState;
179  }
180
181  /**
182   * Returns the current hands in the game of UNO.
183   *
184   * @return List of Hand representing hands of the player's in the game.
185   */
186  public List<Hand> getHands() {
187    return hands;
188  }
189
190  /**
191   * Helper function to validate if a card that a player submits as their move is valid or not.
192   *
193   * @param card submitted by user as their move.
194   * @param user who is submitting a card as their move.
195   * @return
196   */
197  public MoveState validateMove(Card card, User user) {
198    MoveState state = MoveState.INVALID_MOVE;
199    Hand userHand = null;
200    // Checks that it is the current player's turn
201    boolean isPlayersTurn = false;
202    for (Hand hand : hands) {
203      if (hand.getUser().getId().equals(user.getId())) {
204        isPlayersTurn = hand.isTurn();
205        userHand = hand;
206      }
207    }
208    if (!isPlayersTurn) {
209      return MoveState.OUT_OF_TURN;
210    }
211
212    // Check if card is in players hand
213    boolean cardInHand = false;
214    for (Card c : userHand.getCards()) {
215      if (c.getId().equals(card.getId())) {
216        cardInHand = true;
217        break;
218      }
219    }
220    if (!cardInHand) {
221      return MoveState.INVALID_CARD;
222    }
223
224    // Check that the card submitted meets playing conditions according to top discard card.
225    boolean isValidMove = false;
226    Card topDiscardCard = this.topDiscard;
227    if (topDiscardCard != null) {
228//      if (card.getRank() == Rank.WILD || card.getRank() == Rank.DRAW_FOUR) {
229//        isValidMove = true;
230//      } else
231        if (topDiscardCard.getSuit() == card.getSuit()
232          || topDiscardCard.getRank() == card.getRank()) {
233        isValidMove = true;
234      }
235    }
236    if(!isValidMove) {
237      return MoveState.INVALID_MOVE;
238    }
239
240    return MoveState.VALID;
241  }
242
243  /**
244   * Enumeration representing the various game states a game of UNO can be in at any given point in
245   * time.
246   */
247  public enum GameState {
248    CREATED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED
249  }
250
251  /**
252   * Enumeration representing whether a move submitted is valid or not.
253   */
254  public enum MoveState {
255    OUT_OF_TURN, INVALID_CARD, INVALID_MOVE, VALID
256  }
257}
